settings.name: brokerUrls
settings.description: The Kafka cluster to connect to

settings.name: user
settings.description: If connecting to a SASL enabled port, the user id to use for authentication

settings.name: password
settings.description: If connecting to a SASL enabled port, the password to use for authentication

settings.name: trustStore
settings.description: If connecting to a TLS secured port, the directory containing the certificates representing the trust chain for the connection. This is usually just the CACert used to sign the server's certificate

settings.name: topic
settings.description: The Kafka topic on which to listen for messages

settings.name: partitions
settings.description: The specific partitions to consume messages from

settings.name: offset
settings.description: The offset to use when starting to consume messages
